entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING , Gull Bay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:36 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -14.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Armstrong Airport 1:00 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -14.0°C
Pressure: 100.7 kPa
Visibility: 3.6 km
Humidity: 79 %
Wind Chill: -22
Dewpoint: -16.9°C
Wind: NNW 18 km/h gust 39 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Blizzard. High minus 14.
entry.summary: Snow and local blowing snow. Blizzard developing this afternoon. Snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 70. High minus 14. Wind chill near minus 29. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Blizzard. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Blizzard. Snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 80. Low minus 18. Wind chill near minus 31. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Blizzard. High minus 15.
entry.summary: Blizzard ending in the afternoon then flurries. Local blowing snow in the afternoon. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 80. High minus 15. Wind chill near minus 31. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022
